data.oai_dc:dc: Camera trap data from carcass and control sites

Grazing and visitation data collected using motion sensing camera traps at anthrax carcass or control sites (camera= Carcass or Control), for springbok (AM), plains zebra (EQ), gemsbok (OG) or blue wildebeest (CT). "gap" refers to whether the paired camera from the site was functional or not when that particular photo sequence was recorded (N=no, there was no gap in the other camera, Y=yes, there was a gap, i.e. the paired camera was not functioning). Number_grazing is the number of individuals observed grazing during the photo sequence, number_in_rocks is the number of individuals observed within the rock-defined site during the photo sequence.
disease transmission|foraging ecology|parasite avoidance|anthrax|camera traps|host-pathogen contact
